Title: Requires annual screenings for depression of students in grades seven through twelve
Summary: Requires annual screenings for depression of students in grades seven through twelve and requires the department of education and the department of health to review data pertaining to the results of such screenings for local and statewide trends concerning teenage depression.
LawCode: Add ยง905-a, Ed L; amd ยง206, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public health law, in relation to requiring annual screenings for depression of students in grades seven through twelve
